1.title: Back to the Pond
1.plot: Young puffling Oona and her little brother Baba are woken up in the middle of the night by a frog who has lost its way.

2.title: The Fallen Rocks
2.plot: Oona, Baba and their friends try to help Bernie the hermit crab when the entrance to his cave is blocked by a rock fall, trapping him inside!

3.title: Homesick Hoglet
3.plot: Spiky the baby hedgehog is lost. But when Oona goes to get her parents' help, Baba wanders off with Spiky to look for his mama. Now Oona must find him too!

4.title: Silky and the Octopus
4.plot: Silky and Oona encounter a strange creature with eight arms during an underwater adventure. Oona wants to investigate but Silky is not so confident, so they ask Bernie for advice.

5.title: The Salmon Leap
5.plot: Otto wants to see the salmon leap with Oona, but first he must get Pip and Pop settled down to sleep. But Baba is around and the little birds just want to play!

6.title: The Great Gull
6.plot: Oona and Baba go out to play and join forces with the seagulls against a common enemy.

7.title: Babasitting
7.plot: May the rabbit agrees to look after Baba while Oona goes fishing. However, her plans are derailed when Baba finds a hibernating hedgehog.

8.title: The Puffin Way
8.plot: Papa explains that the best way to approach a problem is to think carefully before tackling it, but Oona and Baba find his advice difficult to follow.

9.title: Bernie and the Bee
9.plot: Bernie the hermit crab in a dilemma when a bee gets trapped inside his grotto.

10.title: Find the Owls
10.plot: Otto needs help when his children Pip and Pop go missing.

11.title: Mossy's Flea
11.plot: Animation. Oona organises a get-together in the undergrowth with her friends, but things do not go to plan when Mossy brings along an uninvited guest - Fred the Flea.

12.title: Dinner at Bernie's
12.plot: Animation. Bernie is expecting a visit from a lady-hermit crab named Bernadette. Oona and Baba help him find food for a feast, but the Shrew Crew cause problems.

13.title: The Dung Beetle
13.plot: Animation. Oona and Baba watch a dung beetle roll a ball of poop over the sand dunes back to its nest. Oona's digging skills come in useful at a crucial moment.

14.title: Oona's Fishing Trip
14.plot: Animation. Oona joins Papa on her first big fishing trip - but diving for fish is difficult when it's windy and the seagulls are hungry for fish too.

15.title: Spot the Ladybird
15.plot: Animation. Oona is too ill to join Baba, Mossy and May on a ladybird-spotting trip, so they decide to bring one back for her - but catching a ladybird isn't easy.

16.title: The Best Shell
16.plot: When Baba takes a beautiful shell from Bernie's grotto without Bernie's permission, Bernie thinks that the Red Crabs have taken it and sets out to confront them...

17.title: The Meteor Shower
17.plot: Tonight the sky will be full of shooting stars! Everyone is excited - except Silky, who is not sure that she will like it. So Oona risks missing it in order to reassure her friend.

18.title: The Dragonfly Display
18.plot: Otto loves dragonflies and is keen for his young friends to see their aerial display. But Baba gets into trouble while they wait for them to begin...

19.title: Silky's New Friend
19.plot: Silky has a new friend - Clementine the clam - and is offended when Oona can't understand why Silky thinks that she's so special.

20.title: The First Snow
20.plot: The world outside the burrow has turned white, and Oona and Baba set off with May and Mossy for their first adventure in the snow.

21.title: Oona's Cave
21.plot: Oona is practising her burrow-building skills, when Mossy and Silky unintentionally ruin her hard work. But she soon misses her friends when she finds a place to practise alone.

22.title: Just Like Mama
22.plot: Oona learns a lot about her Mama when they go on an expedition together to find fresh seaweed for the nest. She loves to have fun, and she is very, very brave indeed!

23.title: Diving Deeper
23.plot: Oona is practising her diving skills, and Baba, Bernie and Silky are cheering her on. However, she cannot dive deep enough to reach Baba's pebble, so Silky shows her how...

24.title: A Day Out
24.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

25.title: Owl School
25.plot: Oona and Baba are at owl school, learning how they hunt, fly silently and see in the dark. Baba is impressed, but Oona's puffin skills are just as impressive when she rescues Pip.

26.title: A Hot Day
26.plot: It's a hot day and everyone is struggling to stay cool. Baba finds some of Flynne's fur, and Oona thinks that she must need help. What could be causing Flynne to lose all her fur?

27.title: A Summer Visitor
27.plot: Oona makes a new friend - Chloe, an Arctic tern, is visiting Puffin Rock for the summer. Oona enjoys showing her round the island and introducing her to all her friends.

28.title: Lamb Chase
28.plot: When Oona and Baba find a little lamb, Oona decides that it must be lost. She tries to find its mama, but must also keeps an eye on the two energetic youngsters while they play.

29.title: Mossy Impossible
29.plot: Oona gets tangled up in fishing twine near Seagull Cliff! Mossy and Bernie need Mama and Papa Puffin's help to free her. Someone has to find them before the seagulls come back...

30.title: A Special Seashell
30.plot: Baba is sick and needs to rest at home, so Oona promises to bring him back a shiny seashell to cheer him up. But the pesky seagulls make her mission very difficult.

31.title: Turtle Taxi
31.plot: When Bernie's lady friend Bernadette pays him a visit, she needs rescuing when she gets carried away by the tide.

32.title: New Neighbours
32.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

33.title: Rainbow
33.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

34.title: Puffin Treasure
34.plot: Oona and Silky are off to explore the kelp forest, but Baba is too young to join them. Mama has something special planned for him. They're off on a treasure hunt!

35.title: Mossy's Mystery
35.plot: Mossy has been waiting for the biggest berry on the island to ripen. But the Shrew Crew beats everyone to all the berries!

36.title: The Longest Day
36.plot: It's the longest day of the year. Oona and her friends gather at the stone circle to watch the sun rise, but Mossy has overslept!

37.title: House Hunting
37.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

38.title: Super Snail
38.plot: Baba makes friend with a little snail, but is reluctantly called away to judge a race between Oona and May. When Baba returns, the snail has vanished.

39.title: Day and NIght
39.plot: The owls are determined to see the solar eclipse today, and need Oona and Baba to help them stay awake. But after a night's hunting, they are very sleepy...

1.title: Puffin Practice
1.plot: Oona and Baba practice acting like grown-up puffins.

2.title: The Mystery Egg
2.plot: Oona, Baba, and Mossy help return an egg to its parents.

3.title: To See the Moon
3.plot: Oona tells everyone to stay up late in order to see a super moon.

4.title: The Shiny Shell
4.plot: Baba finds a shiny shell that attracts the attention of the seagulls.

5.title: Friendly Flynne
5.plot: Flynne the fox helps Oona and Baba find Mossy.

6.title: A Feather Bed
6.plot: Baba and Oona search for soft materials to make a new bedding for the family burrow.

7.title: Beach Rescue
7.plot: Oona and Baba help rescue a baby seagull that gets trapped in fishing line on the beach.

8.title: Lost Berries
8.plot: Baba and Oona help Mossy collect berries for the Shrew Crew.

9.title: Night Lights
9.plot: Oona makes a nighttime trip to the sea all by herself.

10.title: Pond Life
10.plot: Oona tries to keep Baba out of the mud.

11.title: Bird Detective
11.plot: Oona watches the seagulls to learn more about their behavior.

12.title: Bernie's Shell
12.plot: Oona and Silky help find Bernie a new shell.

13.title: Hop, Skip and Bump
13.plot: Oona wants to learn to jump high, just like a frog.

14.title: Bouncing Back
14.plot: Oona and Silky want to play together but struggle to find a game they both enjoy.

15.title: A Noisy Neighbour
15.plot: A noisy starling outside the puffin burrow keeps Baba awake, so Oona tries to find her a place to sleep.

16.title: Stormy Weather
16.plot: Baba and Oona find themselves stuck in a seagull nest during a storm.

17.title: Rock Music
17.plot: Oona practices singing with her mother so that she can sing at the dawn choir.

18.title: Baba's Adventure
18.plot: After Oona leaves him to play with a whale, Baba finds his way home with the help of his friends.

19.title: The Burrow Race
19.plot: Oona and May race underground in the burrow.

20.title: Silky's Slide
20.plot: Baba and Oona must rescue Silky after a storm traps her on a cliff.

21.title: Ruffled Feathers
21.plot: Oona, Baba, and a sleepy Otto search for a white egret.

22.title: Finding Bernie
22.plot: Oona and Silky explore the kelp forest and rescue Bernie, who's been swept out to sea.

23.title: The Foggy Day
23.plot: Oona and Baba leave the burrow on a foggy day and get lost.

24.title: Run, Flap, Fly
24.plot: Oona practices learning to take off from the water so that the seagulls won't be able to steal her fish.

25.title: Follow the Puffin
25.plot: Oona helps Mossy by leading the Shrew Crew in clearing out a tunnel.

26.title: Spot the Puffin
26.plot: Oona's brightly-colored beak keeps her from winning a game of hide-and-seek with her friends.

27.title: The Sad Whale
27.plot: Oona and Silky help a lost whale return to its family safely.

28.title: The Fast Day
28.plot: Baba and Oona chase a fast moth around the island.

29.title: Baba's Friend
29.plot: Baba finds and becomes friends with a caterpillar.

31.title: Silky's Seahorses
31.plot: Silky finds and takes care of a group of seahorses.

32.title: Keeping Cosy
32.plot: It's a cold day on Puffin Rock, and Mossy is having trouble staying warm.

33.title: Baba's Picnic
33.plot: While Oona and Silky are out at sea playing, Baba and Mossy prepare a picnic.

34.title: Cave Camping
34.plot: The Puffin family goes camping in an underwater cave.

35.title: The Empty Shell
35.plot: The red crabs grow new shells, but their empty shells attract the seagulls' attention.

36.title: Three's a Crowd
36.plot: Pip and Pop come over to play, but Baba and Pop have so much fun together that Pip feels left out.

37.title: Mossy Goes Solo
37.plot: Mossy gets tired of sharing food with the rest of the Shrew Crew and decides to live on his own.

38.title: Flooded Burrow
38.plot: Oona and Baba stay in May's burrow after the Puffin family burrow floods.

39.title: Daytime Sleepover
39.plot: Oona and Baba have a sleepover with the Hoots during the day.

imdb.title: Puffin Rock
plot: _Puffin Rock_ (qv) follows the adventures of Oona, her little brother Baba, and their family and friends on a gorgeous and wild Irish island.
synopsis: Puffin Rock follows the adventures of Oona, her little brother Baba and their family and friends on a gorgeous and wild Irish island.
